ygData.subject: Re: Another female loseing her mind.
ygData.msgSnippet: This is the last post I can find for the mind battle. I m not sure if I responded or not so I ll play it from here. Surgital tried to fight Ice s mind lock on

   This is the last post I can find for the mind battle. I'm not sure if I=
 responded or not so I'll play it from here.

   
  Surgital tried to fight=
 Ice's mind lock on his.  He was down on his knees, which made small crater=
s in the ground, and holding his fists, trying to shake it off.  

  Ice fe=
alt satisfaction in her latest acomplishment. It wasn't every day a single =
bot forces a gestault to it's knees. mentally she tried to reach out to any=
 Maximal that could hear her thoughts. The mutant forced herself through th=
e pain and tried to direct the order to attack while the giant was down. Wh=
en this battle was over she knew she'd need either an asprin or a labotamy =
to stop the pain.
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: CYBERWOLF4 
 =
   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, October 12, 2001 12:57 PM
=
    Subject: Another female loseing her mind.


    Surgitals flashback was=
 sent into Ices mind, she saw everything as if it was happening to her. "It=
's not happening to me, it's not me." she kept telling herself as blade aft=
er blade struck her mental form. Trying desperately to control her thoughts=
 she shouted another command. "SEPERATE"
     
    Her owl form spun out of=
 control as she hit the ground. Seeing that form cut and beaten she transfo=
rmed to her mutant robot mode. Her bearlike paws covered her head as a migr=
ane began to form. She tried to be the good leader but her sanity would soo=
n fade if her mind didn't leave Surgital. 
      ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
      From: Samir Duran 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: =
Tuesday, October 09, 2001 4:15 PM
      Subject: The Cybers Will Never Rule=
 since Tankor sucks when it comes to spelling and using capitals


      ::=
Triggerhappy/Skullgrin/Jume/Whee/Surgital::
       
      Triggerhappy's fi=
nger moved to pull the trigger.  Hell Drak's eyes were closed tight, waitin=
g for death.  But nothing happened.  She opened her eyes.  Triggerhappy was=
 hit, and fell to his knees, mouth wide open, shocked, and in pain.  
     =
  
      "You....." Triggerhappy stopped to gasped for air, "Pile of.......=
"
       
      Triggerhappy fell down on his face, so he was laying on the=
 ground.  Where his face was, a puddle of mechfluid appeared, and mechfluid=
s started spilling from where he had been hit.  The punctures in his metal =
started to turn into cracks, and mechfluid came out.
       
      Skullgri=
n, Jume, and Whee watched as Triggerhappy had been supposedly defeated.
   =
    
      "NO!  MY DECEPTIPAL!" Skullgrin shouted.
       
      Skullgrin=
 transformed into Pretender mode, and had his massive, freaky club.  He ran=
 at AzureBlade and threw a lethal blow to AzureBlade's head.  Jume and Whee=
 fired at AzureBlade.
       
      "No!  Watch out!" Hell Drak yelled.
   =
    
      A light came into her optics, and then she quickly got up and do=
ve at AzureBlade, trying to take him down, but out of the way of damage...
=
      ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
      Surgital suddenly felt something from Ice.  The=
 mind thing.  Pain.  
       
      "No........not this.......I thought I h=
ad forgot about this!" Surgital said, but which Bodicon was saying it, nobo=
dy knew.
       
      Surgital didn't feel physical pain, but a flashback =
showed up, and would be visible in the minds of both Ice and all the Bodico=
ns.  It was a flashback from Decapitron!  
       
      Flashback:  Decapi=
tron was tied to a conveyer belt, with some sort of energon rope.  He was h=
orrified, and was screaming for help.  Then, he went forward, and a bunch o=
f saws and stuff came down!  They started cutting at Decapitron.  All he co=
uld do was scream in sheer pain.  Each saw blade had the Autobot symbol eng=
raved on it.  Decapitron, still tied onto the conveyer belt, was now headin=
g into a large box thing.  On the way, a heavy thing with an Autobot symbol=
 came down and sort of crushed Decapitron's head.  Then, Decapitron went in=
to the box thing, which also had an Autobot symbol, and then the doors of t=
he box shut, and then Decapitron was stuck, and he was getting beaten and b=
attered.  After the 10 minute torture process was done in the box, Decapitr=
on kept going.  Mechfluid and oil and stuff were pouring like mad, and he w=
as mangled and dislocated and stuff.  Finally, he was at the end, and was d=
umped off of the conveyer belt and onto the ground.  The last thing he had =
seen back then when that happened, was Autobots around him, laughing sinist=
erly with evil eyes and faces.  
      *Flashback Ends*
       
      Surgi=
tal was still...
